name: Cookie Yummy Sweet Happy
description:
Cookie Yummy Sweet Happy
Cookie Yummy Sweet Happy, classical match 3 puzzle and surely bring to you exciting!
You'll start on a spectacular journey with exciting and challenge objectives you have never seen before!A deliciously yummy cookie jams game,this match-3 game is full of more addictive levels. Whip your way though hundreds of puzzle unique levels and make pops saga in this jam and blast your mind to avoid frozen in any level.
Fantastic cookie wonderland, 100+ well-designed free levels! Watch out the cookie star jam and moves you left when you going through a cookie journey.
Cookie Yummy Sweet Happy Features:

- Free fall to play!
- Stunning music and sound crush splash effects!
- Hundreds of funny cookie crush puzzles levels, each one is unique saga!
- Compete to be on top of the leader boards!
